{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3324890,"name":"","username":"warmful","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/warmful/{size}/218474_2.png","created_at":"2024-03-05T21:00:49.383Z","cooked":"

Hello everyone,

I am currently working on trying to get note detection working with custom Python code using the WPILib image. In the UI, there was an error with importing the networktables package (I assume it is because the WPILib image doesn’t contain that package). Anyone know how to fix this? I have attached a portion of our code as well as the console output in the wpilib image UI.

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/pi/uploaded.py", line 3, in <module>

    from networktables import NetworkTablesInstance
ModuleNotFoundError: No module named 'networktables'

Waiting 5 seconds...

CODE

import cv2
import numpy as np
from networktables import NetworkTablesInstance
from cscore import CameraServer
